Class RateLimiterInterceptor

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.security.RateLimiterInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.grpc.ServerInterceptor
public class RateLimiterInterceptor extends Object implements io.grpc.ServerInterceptor
Rate Limiter gRPC Interceptor - protects against abuse. Features: - Per-user rate limiting - Per-method rate limiting - Token bucket algorithm - Configurable limits
